oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With this is bound: Itḥāf al-murīdīn li-ʻaqīdat Umm al-burhān / Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Abī Bakr al-Ghadāmisī (ff. 29v-128r) -- Ḥāshiyah ʻalā al-ʻAqīdah al-Sanūsīyah / Muḥammad ibn Abī al-Qāsim ibn Naṣr al-Thawrī (ff. 129v-164r) -- al-Durrah al-mushayyadah fī sharḥ al-Murshidah / Muḥammad ibn ʻAbbād al-Tilimsānī (ff. 165v-199v) -- Ightinām al-fawāʼid bi-sharḥ Qawāʻid al-ʻaqāʼid / Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad Zarrūq (ff. 200v-229v).
MS Arab SM578. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
